item.title: Bjartek aka Bjarte S. Karlsen
item.description: About me I go by the handle of bjartek on the internet and have done so for quite a few years now. I have been coding ever since i first touched a computer in 92, got my first part time job in 98 and my first full time job in 2006. I got a masters degree in informatics from NTNU in Norway. I started my career writing PHP webapps, dabbled with iOS when the iPhone arrived , then i transitioned to the JVM and have been developing there pretty much since.
